channel.title: Fixing the ::char command... how to save?
channel.description:
How do i make it so it saves what the user chooses... i followed the tutorial on the tutorial list, and some idiot noob posted a link that didn't work. Can someone please give me a link or tutorial to SAVE what the user chooses?
Thanks
